author: Cracken04
content: I loved Spotify for the longest time but I‚Äôve noticed over the last year or so that their services have gone downhill slowly so it was almost unnoticeable, the prices are increasing and the overall experience feels less user-friendly. On top of that, ads and promotions seem more intrusive, and it feels like the focus has shifted more toward maximizing profit than improving the listener‚Äôs experience.
